translation.Message_0_Page_0: Me? Worried? No sharpshooter could even touch me.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Up top is <color=epic>Sergeant Boone</color>, the best sniper I've ever met in my plentiful years of service.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: That man can hit a can of beans tied to a moving jeep from 250 meters 10 times out of 10.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: And to top it all off, he's armed with an anti-materiel rifle.
